title: Belly Fat Burning Secrets
description:
Jillian has a quarantine epiphany about her limitations and weaknesses. Plus, is it really possible to burn belly fat? And emails about finding your healthiest weight, juicing with fiber, and more!

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
